thread.title: Kellyanne Conway's Old Tweet About FBI Investigations
thread.title_full: Kellyanne Conway's Old Tweet About FBI Investigations | POPSUGAR News

author: Victoria Messina
title: Kellyanne Conway's Old Tweet About FBI Investigations
text:
The internet has a glorious skill of digging up dirt on political figures at the most opportune times. Much like Donald Trump's ironic tweet about the 2015 Oscars resurfaced during the award show this year, one of Kellyanne Conway's social media posts about FBI investigations is seeing the light of day again.
Back in October 2016 — when the FBI announced it was reopening its investigation into Hillary Clinton's emails — Conway threw some major shade at Clinton, claiming that "most honest people" she knows are not investigated by the FBI.
Most honest people I know are not under FBI investigation, let alone two. https://t.co/UcSmSA5aTj
— Kellyanne Conway (@KellyannePolls) October 29, 2016
. @KellyannePolls on HRC: "If you're under your 2nd FBI investigation in the same year then you do have a…corruption & an ethics problem." pic.twitter.com/bWv0d0bGlY
— Fox News (@FoxNews) October 29, 2016
Related:
Now Is the Perfect Time to Resurface This 2012 Tweet From Donald Trump
This is some top-notch irony considering the fact that the very man she is the counselor to has been under investigation for his ties to Russia . Not to mention, these investigations started in July 2016, and Kellyanne tweeted her remarks in October. Double whammy.
